Articles.Content:
Hey guys! My name is NightStriker but you can call me Night

I got Kerbal Space Program about an hour ago but I still haven't gone in to space yet. I haven't even taken off because I don't know two things, firstly (Not most important) I don't know a good Rocket design so if you have one please let me know, I would be very grateful. Then, secondly, when I go to the launch pad with a rocket I click space and nothing happens Could anyone tell me how I can achieve getting into orbit and setting up a satellite please? Many thanks

-Night

Welcome to the community NightStriker70

Try using left shift to throttle up your craft, also check your staging, the engine should be in the bottom stage.

Have fun and fly safe!

Shift to throttle up, ctr to throttle down

Asuming you are in career mode, ship design will come on it's own. You start with a capsule and a single tank+engine, and it'll grow whenever you unlock more nodes.

Experiment with every thing you get. They all have some use, so just slap some parts tougether and see what works

Welcome aboard, Night!

Hope you'll enjoy your stay!
